tool_description: Populates form fields with specified data, supporting text inputs, textareas, checkboxes, radio buttons, and hidden fields with validation.

field_mappings.description: Array of field selector and value pairs in format 'selector:value'

clear_before_input.description: Clear existing field content before entering new data

validate_input.description: Validate that input was successfully entered

tab_navigation.description: Use tab key to navigate between fields

trigger_events.description: Trigger change and blur events after input

error_messages: Invalid session: Session ID does not exist or has expired
Invalid field mappings format: Use 'selector:value' format for each mapping
Field not found: One or more field selectors could not locate elements
Field not interactable: Field exists but is disabled or not interactable
Input validation failed: Entered value does not match expected value in field
Invalid delay: Input delay must be between 0 and 5 seconds
usage: Provide session_id and field_mappings array with selector:value pairs. Configure input behavior with optional parameters. Returns status of field population operations.

successful_fields.description: Selectors of fields that were successfully populated

failed_fields.description: Selectors of fields that failed to populate

validation_results.description: Validation status for each processed field
